recipe.ingredients: - chickpeas (rinsed and drained): 1 can (15 ounces) - cucumber (diced): 1 medium - cherry tomatoes (halved): 1 cup - red onion (finely chopped): 1/4 cup - kalamata olives (halved): 1/2 cup - feta cheese (crumbled): 1/2 cup - olive oil: 3 tablespoons - lemon juice: 2 tablespoons - garlic (minced): 1 clove - dried oregano: 1 teaspoon - salt: 1/4 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/8 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Vegetables and Chickpeas: In a large bowl, combine the chickpeas, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and kalamata olives. 2. Create Dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper to create the dressing. 3. Combine and Chill: Pour the dressing over the chickpea and vegetable mixture and toss until everything is well coated. Sprinkle crumbled feta cheese on top. 4. Refrigerate: Let the salad chill in the refrigerator for at least an hour before serving to allow the flavors to meld.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 30g, Dietary Fiber: 9g, Sodium: 420mg, Saturated Fat: 3g, Total Fat: 10g, Protein: 8g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 6g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 890 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Chickpeas: 210 calories per can Cucumber: 16 calories Cherry Tomatoes: 27 calories Red Onion: 15 calories Kalamata Olives: 120 calories per 1/2 cup Feta Cheese: 198 calories per 1/2 cup Olive Oil: 360 calories for 3 tablespoons Lemon Juice: 8 calories for 2 tablespoons Garlic, Oregano: Negligible Salt, Black Pepper: Negligible - Serving People: 4
